string.text:
The Brugger Thomet MP9 (Maschinenpistole 9mm, German for "machine pistol") is a submachine gun chambered for the 9?19mm Parabellum cartridge that is designed and manufactured by Brugger Thomet.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Sights: Most simple sights.
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: 9mm Silencer
